title: littleBits' Newest Kit Lets Young Inventors Build Fully-Functional Gadgets
text:
littleBits' Newest Kit Lets Young Inventors Build Fully-Functional Gadgets 
Published By: Gizmodo.com - Today 
Wooden building blocks have inspired the architects of tomorrow for years now, but littleBits wants to instead inspire future engineers. And...
